task_summary: Detect, grasp, raise, and maintain a hold on the blue Pepsi bottle.

task_long_description.overview: A table-top scene shows several bottles and small containers. The robot arm must find the Pepsi bottle (blue, positioned to the right in most frames), approach it with an open gripper, execute a side grasp, verify that the object is secured, lift it slightly, and keep holding it for a short duration. The behavior emphasizes reliable perception with a scan fallback and a bounded number of retries, followed by a precise approach and stable grasp suitable for a cylindrical plastic bottle.
preconditions: Workspace is clear of unexpected obstacles
Pepsi bottle is present on the table
Robot is homed and gripper operational
stepwise_plan: Perceive the Pepsi bottle; if initial detection fails, perform a spiral scan
Approach and align to the bottle within 1 cm tolerance
Verify the object is in the gripper
success_criteria: Bottle successfully grasped and lifted off the table
Object remains in gripper for the hold duration
failure_and_recovery: If detection fails, the scan fallback is used
If grasp fails or is unstable, the sequence is retried up to 3 times
If object slips after lift, reopen, re-align, and reattempt
task_long_description.termination: Terminate after a successful hold duration is completed or after retries are exhausted.

frame_3.now_evidence: Arm moves toward the right-side blue bottle with clear alignment to target.
frame_3.predicts_next: Grasp action expected imminently after alignment completes.

node_specs.description: Visual detection of the Pepsi bottle.
Fallback scan to localize the bottle if initial detection fails.
Approach and align end-effector with the bottle.
Execute standard side grasp on cylindrical bottle.
Lift the held bottle slightly off the surface.
Maintain a stable hold for a fixed duration.

failure_modes: Target not detected due to glare/occlusion
Timeout during approach due to obstruction
recovery_strategy: Reopen and realign before next attempt
assumptions: The rightmost blue bottle is Pepsi; visual branding is inferred from color/position.
Holding means lifting and maintaining grasp without placing.

expected_success_criteria: Robot secures the Pepsi bottle and holds it steadily for â‰¥2 s after a 0.10 m lift.
